avatar_ancillaries_descriptions.description:
%-n morale to all enemy ashigaru units. 
 
 A man makes his own fate, sometimes.

Enemy cavalry: %-n charge bonus. 
 
 It's only theft if you are caught.

%+n attack to all sword infantry. 
 
 The sword must be one with the hand.

%+n armour to all monk units. 
 
 Armour does not weaken the spirit.

%+n accuracy to all bow units. 
 
 When the heart is pure, the arrow finds a way.

Reduced speed for all enemy bow and matchlock infantry. 
 
 The wise man runs with caution when touching cloth.

%+n morale to all cavalry. 
 
 Men, like horses, need a firm hand.

%-n reload skill for all enemy bow units. 
 
 Cold hands make strangers of familiar tasks.
Reduced reload skill for all enemy matchlock units. \n \n Rain, fog and water drive the devils from black powder.

%+n melee defence to all naginata infantry. 
 
 Drill is a battle without blood.

%+n accuracy for all matchlock units. 
 
 The smell is sulphurous, the results: astounding!

%+n%% speed for all cavalry. 
 
 A stud is always useful.

%+n reload skill for all matchlock units. 
 
 Guns are useless in the hands of idiots.

%+n armour to all melee infantry. 
 
 Protection is wisdom.

Increased fatigue resistance for all cavalry. 
 
 Peasants cannot hide everything.

Your two most damaged veteran units will fully heal before the next battle. 
 
 A garden soothes the soul.

Increases enemy avatar cooldowns by %n0%. 
 Cancels effects of enemy Metsuke Inspector retainer. 
 
 There can be mercy in a dish of tea.

Naginata Warrior Monk Hero: %+n morale. 
 
 "Here is Benkei! None shall pass!"
\n Naginata Attendants: %+n charge bonus,
%+n melee attack. \n \n "Fall upon the enemy with the flames of Enryakuji in your hearts!"

Sword Attendants: %+n melee attack. 
 
 Technique and honour separate the warrior on the battlefield from the peasant in the rice field.
\n Katana Hero: %+n melee attack,
%+n morale. \n \n "Fight ME!"
\n Enemy Attendants: %-n morale
& %-n charge bonus. \n \n "Fools are always trapped by loyalty."
\n Fortress gates in siege battles in which you are the attacker will be open at the start of battle. \n
Kisho Ninjas gain: %+n melee attack,
%+n melee defence,
& increased movement speed. \n \n "You ain't seen me, right?"
\n Foot Samurai: %n melee attack,
%n melee defence,
%+n accuracy,
%+n reload speed. \n \n A man cannot walk two paths at once. A choice lies at the start of every journey.
\n Avatar and all veterans: %+n morale.

Warrior Monks and Nuns: %+n%% recruitment cost. 
 
 Lust and loathing are two sides of the same coin.
Warrior Monks and Nuns: %+n morale.

All veterans: %+n%% recruitment cost.
 
 "Ignore all earthly beauty. It fades."

Naginata Warrior Monk Hero: %+n armour. 
 
 "Tajima... cut through those [arrows]... with his whirling naginata, so that even the enemy looked on in admiration."

Avatar: %+n melee defence. 
 
 A man at your back forestalls many problems.

Avatar slightly decreases morale of enemy units in vicinity. 
 
 There is solace, even for the warrior.

Avatar: %+n hitpoints. 
 
 Every boy would die for his hero.

%+n accuracy for Bow Ashigaru units. 
 
 Men are the fiercest prey of all.

Warrior Monk units receive %n%% increased speed. 
 
 Truth flies on swift wings.

%+n morale to all samurai melee infantry. 
 
 The mob is not an army.

%-n%% recruitment cost for all ashigaru units. 
 
 Words can move a man's heart to sorrow, or anger.

Avatar: %+n armour. 
 
 There is honour in serving well.

Avatar: 
 Your Avatar and his bodyguard's melee attacks pierce armour. 
 
 The cleansing stroke brings its own peace.

%+n%% speed for all cavalry units. 
 
 Speed comes more readily to the rider with a comfortable seat.

Reduced speed for all enemy cavalry units. 
 
 Dull eye and drooping ear speak eloquently of the suffering within.

%+n charge bonus to all monk units. 
 
 There are many paths to heaven.

Avatar: %+n hitpoints. 
 
 Loyalty reflects well on the one who gives it.

Avatar: 
 Your Avatar and his bodyguard have %+n morale. 
 
 An honest faith armours an honest soul.

Avatar's rally ability also causes %-n to enemy morale in radius. 
 Cancels effect of enemy Shinobi Informer retainer. 
 
 "You're nicked, my old beauty!"

Increased fatigue resistance for all melee infantry. 
 
 Without stores, an army soon becomes a hungry mob.

Avatar: %+n charge bonus. 
 
 A samurai may need his weapon at any moment.

Reduced fatigue resistance for all enemy cavalry. 
 
 A horse's stamina is only a good as the oats it is fed.

Increased ability to spot hidden enemy units. 
 
 Knowledge is better than rumour.

Allows player to field Kisho Ninjas. 
 
 The hidden knife is no less deadly for being expected.

%+n ammunition to all bow units. 
 
 The arrow is no less important than the bow.

Allows you to field 1 siege engine (Fire Rockets, Mangonel or Cannon) 
 
 Summer dust and heat, oxen bellow, drivers goad: doom rumbles onward.

%+n melee attack for all monk units. 
 
 The pure heart beats louder than any war drum.

%+n melee attack to all melee cavalry. 
 
 Nothing in battle should be a surprise.

%+n morale for ashigaru units. 
 
 Wealth is a full ricebowl.

Your units sacrifice attack power for greatly increased defence. 
 All units receive: 
 %-n melee attack
%+n melee defence
%-n reload speed
%+n morale. \n \n There is little wisdom in bringing pain to others, yet much in avoiding pain.

All unit cooldowns reduced by 10%. 
 Cancels effects of enemy Wizened Monk retainer. 
 
 "Do not look for wisdom. It will find you."

%-n enemy bow and matchlock accuracy. 
 
 Strong drink is a comfort to some, a tool for others.

Avatar: melee attack %+n. 
 
 "O! For a muse of fire…"

Reveals the deployment of all enemy units not hidden. 
 Cancels effect of enemy Sage Advisor retainer. 
 
 Secrets and lies travel in the same cart.

Allows player to field Great Guard units. 
 
 The blessings of heaven come in many forms.
Reduced reload skill for enemy European Cannon, Mangonels, Fire Rockets and Hand Mortars. \n \n Sometimes looking is not the same as seeing.

%+n melee attack for all spear infantry units. 
 
 The edge is where the moment is decided.

Reduced fatigue resistance for all enemy melee infantry. 
 
 Food nourishes the spirit as well as the body.

Light cavalry: %+n melee attack. 
 
 Careful husbandry always improves the breed.

%-n%% ammunition for enemy bow units. 
 
 "Ah! Those. Give me a day. I'll find some…"

%+n melee attack for Loan-Sword Ashigaru units. 
 
 The first cut is the deepest.

All enemy melee infantry receive %-n armour. 
 
 The strongest steel will not serve in a worthless cause.

%+n% ammunition to all bow and matchlock units. 
 
 "Do not throw your bow when the arrows are gone!"

A proportion of each unit's casualties will be healed after a battle. 
 
 "Brave wounds mend the quickest!"

%+n accuracy for all bow units. 
 
 A target stands; an enemy thinks.

%+n bonus versus cavalry for all spear, bow and matchlock infantry. 
 
 To cripple a horse is to stop the warrior.

%-n%% recruitment cost for all units. 
 
 Trade is beneath a samurai; money is not.

Avatar: %+n% speed. 
 
 A horseman is only as good as his horse.

Avatar: %+n morale. 
 
 A banner, floating on the breeze, is a noble sight.

%-n melee defence for all enemy spear infantry. 
 
 "Unbalanced? Nonsense! Next you'll be saying I'm unbalanced!"

%-n melee attack to all enemy sword infantry. 
 
 Nothing ventured over dinner, nothing gained.

Increased fatigue resistance for all bow and matchlock infantry. 
 
 Battle gives a man a powerful thirst.

Enemy Warrior Monk units receive %-n morale. 
 
 Doubt gnaws at even the smallest grain of faith.
\n Warrior Monk and Ashigaru units you command have %+n melee defence,
+%n%% recruitment cost &
%+n morale. \n \n The faith of the people is the strength of the people.

Avatar: %+n morale. 
 %-n morale for enemy avatar. 
 Cancels effect of enemy Geisha Poisoner retainer. 
 
 "There is no enemy: defeat your own fears!"

%+n melee defence for Yari Ashigaru units. 
 
 A sore head or bruised knuckles is fair exchange for one's life.
\n Veteran units (including heroes) under your enemy's command receive: \n %-n melee attack,
%-n accuracy &
%-n morale. \n \n The burden of a lifetime bends a man's back.

Avatar: %+n accuracy, 
 %+n reloading skill. 
 
 Horse and bow can be in harmony.

%+n melee attack for all sword infantry. 
 
 "Do not cut at your enemy. Perfect the stroke!"
\n All units have reduced fatigue gain
and %-n% to standard speed penalties for crossing rough terrain. \n \n The sure-footed way is its own reward.

%+n melee defence for all spear infantry. 
 
 Even the simplest thing must be mastered.

%+n reload skill for all bow infantry. 
 
 Men must be lead in battle.

The range at which the enemy can spot hidden units is subject to a %n%% penalty. 
 
 The calm heart does not beat like a drum.

Avatar: increased fatigue resistance. 
 
 No task is humble if it is done well.

Allows you to field 1 piece of artillery (Wooden Cannon, Parrot Gun, Armstrong Gun or Gatling Gun) 
 
 Make every shot count.

Enemy cavalry: %-n charge bonus. 
 
 It's only theft if you are caught.

%+n attack to all sword infantry. 
 
 The sword must be one with the hand.

%+n accuracy to all bow units. 
 
 When the heart is pure, the arrow finds a way.

Ironclad hull strength: %+n%% 
 
 There are ironclad arguments as to why the Royal Navy rules the waves.

%-n reload skill for all enemy bow units. 
 
 Cold hands make strangers of familiar tasks.
\n Frigates: %n%% to Overheat Engine ability cooldown &
%n%% to Fast Reload ability cooldown. \n \n Even a frigate is only as fast as her crew.

Elite infantry reload skill: %+n. 
 
 The bullet is substantial. The needle is within the workings.

Corvette reload skill: %+n. 
 
 "54 seconds: not bad. Not outstanding either! Again!"
\n Ironclads: %n%% to Overheat Engine ability cooldown &
%n%% to Fast Reload ability cooldown. \n \n "Neatly done, Lieutenant. Carry on."

Modern gunpowder cavalry reload skill: %+n. 
 
 "Proven in combat, by the Confederate States of America, sir, among others."

%+n%% speed for all cavalry. 
 
 A stud is always useful.
\n Gunboats: %n%% to Overheat Engine ability cooldown &
%n%% to Fast Reload ability cooldown. \n \n Even a little ship well-handled can punch above its weight.

%+n armour to all melee infantry. 
 
 Protection is wisdom.

Frigate accuracy: %+n. 
 
 "Fire on the rise!"

Enemy line & elite infantry morale: %-n. 
 
 "The men respect me for it."

Increased fatigue resistance for all cavalry. 
 
 Peasants cannot hide everything.

Enemy frigate movement speed: %n%%. 
 
 "A foul bottom? How dare you sir?!"

Frigate movement speed: %+n%%. 
 
 "A Frenchman, sir, builds a ship with a soul. Any Anglo-Saxon idiot can make an ironclad."

Your two most damaged veteran units will fully heal before the next battle. 
 
 A garden soothes the soul.
\n Enemy corvettes: %+n%% to Overheat Engine ability cooldown &
%+n%% to Fast Reload ability cooldown. \n \n "Is there an able seaman anywhere on this ship?!"

Modern gunpowder cavalry have increased fatigue resistance. 
 
 Only a fool looks after his sword yet neglects his horse.

Gunboat reload skill: %+n. 
 
 When you've few guns, make sure you fire often.

Avatar: %+n hitpoints. 
 
 Every boy would die for his hero.

Ironclad reload skill: %+n. 
 
 Precision engineered for maximum efficiency.

Corvette accuracy: %+n. 
 
 Science removes the guesswork from gunnery.

Enemy corvette accuracy: %n. 
 
 "100 yards short again!"
\n Enemy gunboats: %+n%% to Overheat Engine ability cooldown &
%+n%% to Fast Reload ability cooldown. \n \n "Other side lads. 'The port is always left on the table', remember?"

Avatar: %+n armour. 
 
 There is honour in serving well.

Tosa Riflemen, Yugekitai & Sharpshooter movement speed: %+n%%. 
 
 "At the double, men!"

Reduced speed for all enemy cavalry units. 
 
 Dull eye and drooping ear speak eloquently of the suffering within.

Increased fatigue resistance for all melee infantry. 
 
 Without stores, an army soon becomes a hungry mob.

Tosa Riflemen, Yugekitai & Sharpshooter accuracy: %+n. 
 
 Simple, sturdy, and soldier-proof. Deadly, in the right hands, too.

Avatar: %+n charge bonus. 
 
 A samurai may need his weapon at any moment.

Line & elite infantry ammunition: %+n . 
 
 Victory can be decided on the pages of a ledger.
\n Fortress gates in siege battles in which you are the attacker will be open at the start of battle. \n
Kisho Ninjas gain: %+n melee attack,
%+n melee defence,
& increased movement speed. \n \n "You ain't seen me, right?"

Reduced fatigue resistance for all enemy cavalry. 
 
 A horse's stamina is only a good as the oats it is fed.

Increased ability to spot hidden enemy units. 
 
 Knowledge is better than rumour.

Enemy modern gunpowder cavalry reload skill: %-n. 
 
 Accuracy comes at a price.

Enemy elite infantry reload skill: %-n. 
 
 Tried, tested and out-dated.

Enemy Tosa Riflemen, Yugekitai & Sharpshooter accuracy: %-n. 
 
 "Oh, drat these spectacles! Was that a hit? Sergeant?"

%+n ammunition to all bow units. 
 
 The arrow is no less important than the bow.

Enemy Tosa Riflemen, Yugekitai & Sharpshooter movement speed: %-n%%. 
 
 "Phew! I'll catch you up, men."

Enemy gunboat reload skill: %n. 
 
 "All equipment to be correctly stowed BEFORE firing."

Enemy modern gunpowder cavalry have greatly decreased fatigue resistance. 
 
 "See what I mean? Too narrow across the withers."

%+n melee attack to all melee cavalry. 
 
 Nothing in battle should be a surprise.
\n Enemy frigates: %+n%% to Overheat Engine ability cooldown &
%+n%% to Fast Reload ability cooldown. \n \n "Don't you lot know your starboard from your larboard?"

Enemy Tosa Riflemen, Yugekitai & Sharpshooter reload skill: %-n. 
 
 Accuracy comes at a price.
\n Enemy Ironclads: %+n%% to Overheat Engine ability cooldown &
%+n%% to Fast Reload ability cooldown. \n \n "Take that man's name!"

Avatar: melee attack %+n. 
 
 "O! For a muse of fire…"

Reveals the deployment of all enemy units not hidden. 
 
 Secrets and lies travel in the same cart.

Gunboat accuracy: %+n. 
 
 "Steady. Steady. Fire!"

%+n melee attack for all spear infantry units. 
 
 The edge is where the moment is decided.

Enemy modern gunpowder cavalry accuracy: %-n. 
 
 "YOU try standing still whilst someone fires a gun over your head!"

Tosa Riflemen, Yugekitai & Sharpshooter reload skill: %+n. 
 
 A good reliable weapon, as you'd expect from Her Majesty's Government.

Reduced fatigue resistance for all enemy melee infantry. 
 
 Food nourishes the spirit as well as the body.

%-n%% ammunition for enemy bow units. 
 
 "Ah! Those. Give me a day. I'll find some…"

Avatar: %+n% speed. 
 
 A horseman is only as good as his horse.

Avatar: %+n morale. 
 
 A banner, floating on the breeze, is a noble sight.

%-n melee defence for all enemy spear infantry. 
 
 "Unbalanced? Nonsense! Next you'll be saying I'm unbalanced!"

Enemy Ironclad reload skill: %n. 
 
 "Gun practice Lieutenant? Not today, I have a headache."

Enemy line & elite infantry ammunition: %-n%. 
 
 ...Click!...
\n Corvettes: %n%% to Overheat Engine ability cooldown &
%n%% to Fast Reload ability cooldown. \n \n A good crew is as one with their ship.

Line & elite infantry morale: %+n. 
 
 War is the school of warriors.

Modern gunpowder cavalry accuracy: %+n. 
 
 Man and beast in perfect harmony.
\n All units have reduced fatigue gain
and %-n% to standard speed penalties for crossing rough terrain. \n \n The sure-footed way is its own reward.

%+n melee defence for all spear infantry. 
 
 Even the simplest thing must be mastered.

%+n reload skill for all bow infantry. 
 
 Men must be lead in battle.

The range at which the enemy can spot hidden units is subject to a %n%% penalty. 
 
 The calm heart does not beat like a drum.

Avatar: increased fatigue resistance. 
 
 No task is humble if it is done well.

Reduced modern Imperial unit casualties. 
 Increased Clan Influence Points gain. 
 
 There is great honour in service to the Emperor.

Reduced modern Shogunate unit casualties. 
 Increased Clan Influence Points gain. 
 
 Tradition and honour are everything.

Reduced bow unit casualties. 
 Increased Clan Influence Points gain. 
 
 Training is never wasted in life.

Reduced melee cavalry casualties. 
 Increased Clan Influence Points gain. 
 
 Training is never wasted in life.

Reduced spear infantry casualties. 
 Increased Clan Influence Points gain. 
 
 Training is never wasted in life.

Reduced sword infantry casualties. 
 Increased Clan Influence Points gain. 
 
 Training is never wasted in life.

Avatar: %+n charge bonus, 
 %+n bonus versus cavalry. 
 
 Everything can be perfected.

Avatar: %+n speed. 
 
 The noble steed demands a noble master.

Avatar: aura radius increased and rally ability cooldown decreased. 
 
 A noble sign brings terror to enemies' hearts.

%+n morale for all units. 
 
 When men lift their eyes to heaven, their hearts follow.
\n Enemy units close to your avatar suffer a %-n morale penalty.

Your avatar has %+n morale. 
 
 The God of Battles should show a hard face to the world.

Avatar: %+n melee defence. 
 
 What use a general's brains if they are splashed to the winds?

Avatar: %+n hitpoints, 
 %+n armour. 
 
 "Yes Great Lord, truly a splendid helmet!"

Avatar: %+n armour. 
 
 Sometimes age adds to the worthiness of a thing.

Avatar: %+n hitpoints. 
 
 The wise man seeks out the very best of everything.

Avatar: %+n melee attack. 
 
 Some swords will seek out worthy hands.
